items.sentence: When the teacher is very strict, the students must mind their P's and Q's.
Tom needed a place to stay, so I told him that he could stay at our place.
Tom nearly drowned in the pond near his house when he was three years old.
Tom's girlfriend's ex-boyfriend's girlfriend used to be John's girlfriend.
When I returned to the parking lot, my car's windshield had a crack in it.
